content.p: The Star Internship Programme Description: With the sheer complexity and diversity of our operations in the media industry, The Star Internship Programme is ideal for undergraduates to test their abilities on genuine business challenges and to be exposed to real work responsibilities. The Programme: It is designed for undergraduates in any disciplines relevant to our operations. A letter of recommendation from the candidate's institution of higher learning is required. Requirements: How to apply: Students is encouraged to submit their application form and CV via their respective school and you can download the internship application form here. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
